nodes.text: "Bait" is a short story by Alan Dean Foster. Published in Star Wars Insider 162, it focused on the character Grummgar, who made an appearance in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens.
The story was later included in the special eBook edition of the novelization of The Force Awakens, also by Alan Dean Foster, as well as its paperback edition, released on September 27, 2016.
